items.title: Stock Market LIVE updates: Wall Street drives Asia markets higher; Indian markets set to follow
items.description: Stock Market LIVE updates: Markets in India were poised to open higher, tracking overnight gains in the US markets that were also driving stocks higher in other Asian markets.

items.title: Stocks To Watch: Dixon Tech, Awfis Space, Adani Green, Suzlon, Airtel
items.description: Stocks To Watch: HP India is set to partner with Dixon Technologies' subsidiary, Padget Electronics, to manufacture notebooks, desktops, and all-in-one PCs in Chennai under the PLI 2.0 scheme.

items.title: Nifty Fin Services, PSU Bank: Check support, resistance & other levels here
items.description: The Nifty PSU Bank Index is currently positioned in a manner where buying on dips presents the most favourable trading strategy for near-term traders.

items.description: Share Market Today: Global markets bounce back, Adani Group turns the heat on Bangladesh, P N Gadgil Jewellers IPO opens today

items.title: Asia shares rise marginally with focus on US inflation test, Fed meet
items.description: Japan's Nikkei last traded 0.4 per cent higher, helped by gains in financial and consumer names

items.title: Shree Tirupati Balajee IPO allotment today: check status, GMP & more
items.description: Once the allotment of Shree Tirupati Balajee IPO is finalised, investors can check the allotment status by visiting the official websites of BSE, NSE, or Link Intime India, the registrar for the issue

items.title: HG Infra Engg shares zoom 5% on bagging LoA from Ministry of Road Transport
items.description: HG Infra Engineering share price rose as much as 5.50 per cent at Rs 1,542 per share on the BSE in Tuesday's intraday trade

items.title: Bajaj Housing Finance IPO Day 2: GMP soars 92%; should you subscribe?
items.description: Shares of Bajaj Housing Finance were quoted trading at a premium of Rs 64 or 91.43 per cent in the grey market, indicating a positive market sentiment for the IPO

items.title: IRB Infrastructure August toll collection zooms 20% YoY; share price gains
items.description: The August 2024 toll revenue grew over 20 per cent year-on-year to Rs 503 crore, from Rs 417 crore in August 2023.

items.title: GMR Airports ups 3% on move to acquire Fraport's 10% stake in IGI Airport
items.description: GMR Airports is in the process of raising its stake in Delhi International Airport by acquiring the 10 per cent stake owned by Germany's Fraport

items.title: F&O Insights: See what FIIs OI, PCR data suggests; HUL, PFC, RECL in focus
items.description: Derivatives market update for Sept 10: IndiaMart InterMesh, HUL and Sun TV saw long buildup on Monday; while PFC, RECL and Granules India saw shorts added.

items.description: P N Gadgil Jewellers IPO opened for public subscription today. Should you bid for the public issue or not? Check the brokerage call and other key details here

items.title: Nomura cuts target prices for Axis Bank, SBI and BoB ahead of Fed meeting
items.description: Analysts at Nomura suggested that larger private banks are likely to experience a greater negative impact on their NIMs from the potential US Fed rate cuts compared to mid-sized & smaller banks.

items.title: Sona BLW share price surges 3% on raising funds worth Rs 2400 crore via QIP
items.description: The Sona BLW share price rose after the company announced that it has successfully raised Rs 2,400 crore via qualified institutional placement (QIP).

items.title: Ahluwalia Contracts shares rally 7% after bagging orders worth Rs 1,307 cr
items.description: Shares of Ahluwalia Contracts shot up by 6.78 per cent, recording an intraday high of Rs 1,280 per share on the BSE on Tuesday

items.title: Premier Energies hits lifetime high after order win; zooms 181% in one week
items.description: Shares of Premier Energies hit their lifetime high at Rs 1,264.90 per share on the BSE, rallying 4.84 per cent in Tuesday's intraday deals

items.title: Paytm surges 9%, hits over 7-month high on heavy volumes; up 34% in 1 month
items.description: In nine trading days since August 29, the market price of Paytm has rallied 28% after Paytm Payment Services received FDI approval. It will also resubmit its payment aggregator licence application.

items.title: Zaggle Prepaid surges 6% on inking deal with HDFC Ergo General Insurance Co
items.description: The Zaggle Prepaid Ocean Services share price rose after the company announced that it has inked a pact with HDFC Ergo General Insurance Company.

items.title: Bikaji, Gopal Snacks stocks get tastier after GST council cuts rate; up 8%
items.description: Gopal Snacks and Bikaji Foods share price rallied after GST Council slashed GST rates from 18 per cent to 12 per cent

items.title: Bajaj Housing IPO buzz: 2 home finance stocks with likely up to 14% upside
items.description: Technical chart suggests that PNB Housing Finance and Repco Home Finance can potentially rally up to 14 per cent from present levels.

items.title: Kross IPO Day 2: GMP holds at 20%; should you park your money here?
items.description: Kross IPO subscription status: Retail Individual Investors have placed the highest bid of 2.16 times, followed by Non-Institutional Investors at 1.01 times

items.title: Akzo Nobel India rallies 5%; hits record high on healthy growth outlook
items.description: Akzo Noble India shares climbed following the start of commercial production of powder coating products from its Gwalior plant with an installed capacity of 5,166 tonne per annum.

items.title: IREDA share jumps 7% on pacts with SJVN, GMR Energy for project in Nepal
items.description: The IREDA scrip surged as much as 7.21 per cent to hit an intraday high of Rs 239.35 per share.

items.title: Crude Oil Strategy today: Check target price, resistance & other key levels
items.description: Oil prices showed marginal recovery on Monday to settle a per cent up at $68.71, following its worst weekly fall since October 2023 as WTI fell 8 per cent and Brent was down 10 per cent.

items.title: Action Construction Equipment shares gain 3% on order from defence ministry
items.description: Action Construction Equipment share price gained up to 3.44 per cent at Rs 1278.15 per share on the BSE in Tuesday's intraday deals

items.title: SEPC shares up over 4% on bagging Rs 183-cr order from Bihar Government
items.description: The uptick in SEPC share price came after the company announced that it has secured an order of Rs 182.56 crore.

items.title: This Tata Group stock quotes at an all-time high; market cap nears 1 trn
items.description: Shares of Indian Hotels Company hit a new high of Rs 693.35, gaining 4 per cent on the BSE in Tuesday's intra-day trade amid heavy volumes on expectations of strong revenue growth.

items.title: In demand! Tolins Tyres IPO oversubscribed 3x on Day 2; All details here
items.description: Tolins Tyres IPO was oversubscribed nearly three-fold on Day 2, after receiving bids for 21.9 million shares, against 7.5 million shares on offer

items.title: Dixon Technologies share up after unit inks MoU with HP India; details here
items.description: Dixon Technologies arm inks MoU with HP India; Kotak recommended 'Sell'

items.title: Tata Power soars 6% on starting solar cell production at Tamil Nadu plant
items.description: The Tata group company's solar cell production, currently at 2 GW capacity, will enhance Tata Power's ability to meet the growing demand for high-quality and domestically produced solar components.

items.title: Pharma stocks soar 6% as investors respond to double dose of Good News!
items.description: Individually, shares of Laurus Labs rose up to 5.55 per cent at Rs 517.90 per share, Akums Drugs and Pharmaceuticals shares locked in 5 per cent upper circuit at Rs 910.55 a piece

items.title: Sebi chief, husband got money from M&M: Congress' new allegation
items.description: Opposition party continues attack on Madhabi Puri Buch, accuses her of conflict of interest

items.title: Upcoming IPO alert! Influx Healthtech files DRHP with NSE Emerge; details
items.description: The Influx Healthtech IPO comprises a fresh issuance of 46,32,000 equity shares, and an offer for sale of up to 13,68,000 equity shares, each with a face value of Rs 10
